attributes.additional_details:
I'm going to take football as an example. Currently you can not watch your own team live on TV unless it's one of a handful allowed to be shown on SKY or ESPN.

I feel it's unjust that we're not allowed to watch our childhood teams as according to a "media blackout" we should be supporting our local teams... This is a move to show all sports no matter what sport or team live. It's wrong we can log onto the internet and watch it in Greek yet I can't watch my team when I live 15 minutes away from the stadium. If we want to support our teams/players let us do so, LIVE!
